titleStmt.title: The history of the valorous and vvittie knight-errant, Don-Quixote of the Mancha Translated out of the Spanish.
Don Quixote. Part 1. English
titleStmt.author: Cervantes Saavedra, Miguel de, 1547-1616.
Shelton, Thomas, fl. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby, for Ed. Blount and W. Barret,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved: The history of Don-Quichote. The first parte.
With two final leaves of verses.
Running title reads: The delightfull history of the wittie knight Don-Quixote.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
